text:
Ok... I have some things that I’m going to make decisions on so let me know if you would like to chat. I told you before, you complained you were
not involved, but I asked you to be involved. I am doing that again. Would you like to be involved?
Message 260 of 4024
You are sending me blackmailing texts.
You signed a lease yesterday for 6.800 without consultation and communicated it’s all community property and within your rights to commit me to a
spend for my half without my input.
Threatening me that you will make unilateral decisions because I will not respond to your blackmail threatening texts is your choice.
I do not plan to respond to any more emails, texts, calls or this platform as I feel threatened.
Sent:01/06/2024 at 06:59 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/06/2024 at 06:59 PM)
Subject:Re: Decisions
Message 261 of 4024
As I have mentioned many times before. On several platforms now, I’d like your feedback on a 9 or 12 month lease. I am asking you directly again,
just like I have been for days. I’m not trying to fight you.
And I am not escalating. I am also not addressing what you are saying below. I don’t believe that to be true but you’re free to say what you want.
Do you want to be involved in the term of the lease decision or not?
Sent:01/06/2024 at 07:06 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/06/2024 at 07:22 PM)
Subject:Re: Decisions
Message 262 of 4024
Ok... fyi I was able to talk him into 9 months with month to month after. I’d like 12, I’m so tired
of moving. But want to be sensitive to the churn at play. I’m assuming that is what you would like.
I’m really trying, Christine, I’m just done waiting. On a place to live, getting my stuff, getting a parenting plan for our kids. everything that allows me
to move on. Everywhere you’re blocking me from doing it.
And while I sympathize that you ALWAYS say you have no time, but make time for new relationships while your kids don’t even know about the
divorce and I’m totally blocked, my sympathy runs thin.
You have made zero effort for the kids therapy, or the the work we are supposed to be doing. It’s awesome you’re putting yourself first, but please
start making some time to clean up the wreckage you are creating.
Forget about me. You hate me.
Think about the freaking kids.
Sent:01/06/2024 at 08:19 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/07/2024 at 08:02 AM)
Subject:Re: Decisions
